meta.name: description
meta.content: We are Big Enough To Challenge, Small Enough To Care! Ferndale Area school district has been referred to as a public school in a private school setting. Ferndale Area is proud of our academic accomplishments, our dedication to the personal growth of students, and the standard of excellence we maintain in professional practice.

div.div: As you know, the Governor has announced that Pennsylvania schools will remain closed indefinitely. This is why we must continue education for students using methods we have available to us. Please click "Read More" to be directed to our resource page that will provide you will all necessary information.
Due to the upcoming holiday, the FASD Grab & Go Lunches program will not operate on Friday April 10th & Monday April 13th. The program will resume on Tuesday April 14th.

h3.a: FASD on the Best High Schools in the Johnstown, PA Area
Schools closed rest of the year!

div.div: Governor Wolf announced today that school buildings will remain closed the rest of the 2019-2020 school year.

We are Big Enough To Challenge, Small Enough To Care! Our school district has been referred to as a public school in a private school setting. Ferndale Area is proud of our academic accomplishments, our dedication to the personal growth of students, and the standard of excellence we maintain in professional practice. We invite you to explore our website to learn more about Ferndale Area.
